alternateName.description: An alternative name for this item

areaServed.description: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

airQualityIndex.description: Air quality index is a number used to report the quality of the air on any given day

airQualityIndexForecast.description: Forecasted overall Air Quality Index (AQI) over a certain duration in future

aqiMajorPollutant.description: Major pollutant in the Air Quality Index (AQI)

aqiMajorPollutantForecast.description: Forecasted major air pollutant in the Air Quality Index (AQI) over a certain duration in future

atmosphericPressure.description: The atmospheric pressure observed measured in Hecto Pascals

dataProvider.description: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity

dateCreated.description: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

dateModified.description: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform

dateObserved.description: Date of the observed entity defined by the user

dewPoint.description: The dew point encoded as a number. Observed temperature to which air must be cooled to become saturated with water vapor

diffuseIrradiation.description: Diffuse irradiance is the part of the solar irradiance that is scattered by the atmosphere

directIrradiation.description: Direct irradiance is the part of the solar irradiance that directly reaches a surface

gustSpeed.description: A sudden burst of high-speed wind over the observed average wind speed lasting only for a few seconds

illuminance.description: (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Illuminance) observed measured in lux (lx) or lumens per square metre (cd·sr·m−2)

location.description: Geojson reference to the item. It can be Point, LineString, Polygon, MultiPoint, MultiLineString or MultiPolygon

owner.description: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

precipitationForecast.description: Forecasted rainfall over a certain duration in future

pressureTendency.description: Enum:'falling, raising, steady'. Is the pressure rising or falling? It can be expressed in quantitative terms or qualitative terms

refDevice.description: A reference to the device(s) which captured this observation

refPointOfInterest.description: Point of interest related to the item

relativeHumidity.description: Humidity in the Air. Observed instantaneous relative humidity (water vapour in air)

relativeHumidityForecast.description: Forecasted relative humidity (water vapour in air) over a certain duration in future

seeAlso.description: list of uri pointing to additional resources about the item

snowHeight.description: The snow height observed by generic snow depth measurement sensors, expressed in centimeters

solarRadiation.description: The solar radiation observed measured in Watts per square

source.description: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object

streamGauge.description: The water level surface elevation observed by Hydrometric measurement sensors, namely a [Stream Gauge](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stream_gauge) expressed in centimeters

airTemperatureForecast.description: Forecasted value of air temperature over a certain duration in future

uVIndexMax.description: The maximum UV index for the period, based on the World Health Organization's UV Index measure. [http://www.who.int/uv/intersunprogramme/activities/uv_index/en/](http://www.who.int/uv/intersunprogramme/activities/uv_index/en/) the values between 1 and 11 are the valid range for the index. The value 0 is for describing that no signal is detected so no value is stored

entityId.description: A unique ID for this Smart Data Model

ngsildData.description: The NGSILD data with @context from the context broker

ngsildContext.description: The NGSILD context URL for @context data.
